name: Aeonstave (shooting)
abilities: Blast. Each time an attack is made with this weapon, invulnerable saving throws cannot be taken against that attack.

name: Cutting beam
abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6+2.

name: Doomsday blaster - Low power
abilities: Blast

name: Doomsday blaster - High power
abilities: Blast. The bearer can only make attacks with this profile if it Remained Stationary during its previous Movement phase.

name: Doomsday cannon - Low power
abilities: Blast

name: Doomsday cannon - High power
abilities: Blast. The bearer can only make attacks with this profile if it Remained Stationary during its previous Movement phase.

abilities: Blast

abilities: Blast

name: Exile cannon
abilities: Blast

name: Gauntlet of fire
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

name: Gauss annihilator - Focused beam
abilities: Blast. Each time an attack is made with this weapon against an AIRCRAFT unit, add 2 to that attack's hit roll.

name: Gauss exterminator
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon against an AIRCRAFT unit, add 2 to that attack's hit roll.

name: Heat cannon
abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6+2.

name: Heat ray - Dispersed
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

name: Heat ray - Focused
abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit within half range, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D6+2.

name: Particle whip
abilities: Blast

name: Singularity generator
abilities: Blast

name: Spear of the Void Dragon (shooting)
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, if a hit is scored, draw a straight line between the closest point of this model's base (or hull) and that of the closest model in the target unit. Make one wound roll against the target unit, and each other unit this line passes over. Each time an attack made with this weapon is allocated to a VEHICLE model, that attack hs a Damage characteristic of D3+3.

name: Synaptic disintegrator
abilities: Each time you select a target for this weapon, you can ignore the Look Out, Sir rule. Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified wound roll of 6 inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

name: Tachyon arrow
abilities: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

name: Tesla arc
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 scores 2 additional hits.

name: Tesla cannon
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 scores 2 additional hits.

name: Tesla carbine
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 scores 2 additional hits.

name: Tesla destructor (Tomb Citadel Walls)
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 scores 2 additional hits.

name: Tesla sphere
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 scores 2 additional hits.

name: Tesseract singularity chamber - Particle hurricane
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target, and a wound roll of 2+ is always successful, unless the target is a VEHICLE, then a wound roll of 6 is always successful.

name: Transdimensional projector
abilities: Blast

name: Twin tesla carbine
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 scores 2 additional hits.

name: Twin tesla destructor
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 scores 2 additional hits.

name: Aeonstave (melee)
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, invulnerable saving throws cannot be taken against that attack.

name: Canoptek tail blades
abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes D6 additional attacks with this weapon.

name: Chronotendrils
abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 3 additional attacks with this weapon.

name: Empathic Obliterator
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, if a CHARACTER model is destroyed by that attack, each enemy unit within 6 of the bearer suffers D3 mortal wounds.

name: Feeder mandibles
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, an unmodified hit roll of 6 automatically wounds the target.

name: Flensing claw
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, make 2 hit rolls instead of 1.

name: Hyperphase harvester
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.

name: Hyperphase threshers
abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 1 additional attack with this weapon.

name: Impaling legs
abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 2 additional attacks with this weapon.

name: Ophydian claws
abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 2 additional attacks with this weapon.

name: Portal of exile
abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, that attack automatically hits the target.

name: Scythe of Dust
abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 4 additional attacks with this weapon and no more than 4 attacks can be made with this weapon.

abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon profile, make 2 hit rolls instead of 1.

abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon profile, invulnerable saving throws cannot be made against that attack.

abilities: Each time an attack made with this weapon is allocated to a VEHICLE model, that attack has a Damage characteristic of D3+3.

name: Staff of Stars (melee)
abilities: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 3 additional attacks with this weapon and no more than 3 attacks can be made with this weapon.

abilities: Each time an attack is made with this weapon, subtract 1 from that attack's hit roll.
